h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Copper Pill Location
content: The Copper Pill Soak can be found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at Crouching Tiger Temple \- Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. Simply follow the hill and inside a small box on the Shrine, you can find the Soak.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Copper_Pill.md', within the main section titled 'Copper Pill', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Copper Pill Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Copper Pill Soak can be found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at Crouching Tiger Temple \- Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. Simply follow the hill and inside a small box on the Shrine, you can find the Soak.
